translations.Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit: Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit
translations.IDEA_TOO_LONG_ALERT: Your idea is too long. Please, try to be more concise.
translations.HELPER_PROMPT_SETTING: Provide a prompt to be shown in your activity.
translations.CHOOSE_IDEA_HEADER_TEXT: Read and rate these ideas that have been proposed by other participants. If you find some inspiration, choose one to build upon or propose a brand new idea.
translations.NO_IDEAS_TO_SHOW_TEXT: The other participants have not submitted enough ideas yet. Once they have, these ideas will appear here.
translations.IDEA_BEING_SUBMITTED_ALERT: Your idea is being submitted, please wait for a few seconds.
